com.raweng.built.view

Class BuiltImageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • ImageView
      • com.raweng.built.view.BuiltImageView

  • public class BuiltImageView
extends ImageView
    BuiltImageView use to download image from built.io server.
    Author:
    raw engineering, Inc

    User needs to set BuiltFile instance in setBuiltFile(android.app.Activity, BuiltFile, BuiltImageDownloadCallback).

    BuiltFile can be generate using of data filled BuiltObject and BuiltFile.builtFileWithResponse(JSONObject).

    1. Single Attachment :-
        BuiltFile builtFile = BuiltFile.builtFileWithResponse(builtObject.getJSONObject(Attach_Image_Field_Uid));
    2. Multiple Attachment :-
              
    JSONArray array = builtObject.getJSONArray(Attach_Image_Field_Uid);                 
    for (int i = 0; i < array.length(); i++) {
  
           BuiltFile builtFileImageObject = BuiltFile.builtFileWithResponse(array.optJSONObject(i));
    }
    Example :-
    1. BuiltImageView in layout :-
    User can also set BuiltImageView inside layout files using <com.raweng.built.view.BuiltImageView> tag.

     BuiltImageView  builtImageView = (BuiltImageView) findViewById(R.id.builtImageView);
 
 builtImageViewObject.setBuiltFile(BuiltioDemoAppActivity.this, builtFileImageObject, new BuiltImageDownloadCallback() {
 
        @Override
        public void onSuccess(Bitmap bitmap) { }
 
        @Override
        public void onError(BuiltError error) { }
 
        @Override
        public void onAlways() { }
 });


    2. BuiltImageView dynamically create :-
    
 BuiltImageView builtImageViewObject = new BuiltImageView(Context);
 
 builtImageViewObject.setBuiltFile(BuiltioDemoAppActivity.this, builtFileImageObject, new BuiltImageDownloadCallback() {
  
        @Override
        public void onSuccess(Bitmap bitmap) { }
  
        @Override
        public void onError(BuiltError error) { }
  
        @Override
        public void onAlways() { }
  });

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancelRequest()
      To cancel BuiltImageView network call.
      Should only be called when the app exits.
      void clearCache()
      As for clearing cache.

      Disable file cache for download.

      Disable memory cache for download.

      Return url string of requests.

      Set the animation resource id.
      void setBuiltFile(android.app.Activity activity, BuiltFile builtFile, com.raweng.built.BuiltImageDownloadCallback callback)
      Set BuiltFile to download image.

      Note :
      For large image user can set setTargetedWidth(int).
      If the image is too large in size then user need to add in manifest
      android:largeHeap="true"
      android:hardwareAccelerated="false"

      Set radius to make image corner rounded.

    • Method Detail

      • setBuiltFile

        public void setBuiltFile(android.app.Activity activity,
                BuiltFile builtFile,
                com.raweng.built.BuiltImageDownloadCallback callback)
        Set BuiltFile to download image.

        Note :
        For large image user can set setTargetedWidth(int).
        If the image is too large in size then user need to add in manifest
        android:largeHeap="true"
        android:hardwareAccelerated="false"
        Parameters:
        activity - activity instance.
        builtFile - builtFile instance use for image url to download.
        callback - BuiltImageDownloadCallback object to notify the application when the request has completed.

        imageSource - image resource id.

        public Bitmap getCachedImage()

        Return url string of requests. Returns null if url is not present.
